trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all activity designer components.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse for alle aktiviteten designer komponentene.

trans-unit.source: This type provides the basic look-and-feel functionality for other activity designers and allows a developer to add additional capabilities to an activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen gir grunnleggende utseendet og virkemåten her funksjonalitet for andre aktiviteten utviklere og gjør det mulig for utviklere å legge til ekstra funksjonalitet i en aktivitet utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in order to either display additional interesting information to the user of the activity, create a better on canvas editing experience (for example, using the `ExpressionTextBox` on an `If` activity designer), or to allow contained elements to be edited (again, consider the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> activity).
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer vanligvis enten vises for brukeren til aktiviteten interessant for mer informasjon ved å opprette en bedre på lerretet redigere (for eksempel ved hjelp av den `ExpressionTextBox` på en `If` Aktivitetsdesigner), eller for å tillate inneholder elementer som skal redigeres (igjen, bør du vurdere å den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then%2A>og <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If>aktiviteten).</xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActivityDesigner inherits from <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement> and primarily adds the default styling, as well as the ability to customize the icon via the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ActivityDesigner arver fra <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement>og legger til standard stil, i tillegg til muligheten til å tilpasse ikonet via hovedsakelig av <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner.Icon%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement>

trans-unit.source: It should be used whenever you are creating a designer for a type which derives from <xref:System.Activities.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Det skal brukes når du oppretter en utformer for en type som er avledet fra <xref:System.Activities.Activity>.</xref:System.Activities.Activity>

trans-unit.source: When associated with an <xref:System.Activities.Activity> type, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement.ModelItem%2A> property will point to the ModelItem hierarchy describing the instance of that type being edited.
trans-unit.target: Når knyttet til en <xref:System.Activities.Activity>type, den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement.ModelItem%2A>egenskapen vil instruerer ModelItem hierarkiet som beskriver forekomsten av denne typen redigeres.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement.ModelItem%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Activity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string “DisplayName” in this overridden method implementation.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer strengen "Visningsnavnet" i denne overstyrte metoden implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The string “DisplayName” in this overridden method implementation.
trans-unit.target: Strengen "Visningsnavnet" i denne overstyrte metoden implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of the automation item.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer statusen for automatisering-elementet.

trans-unit.source: The status of the automation item.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for automatisering-elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon associated with this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ikonet knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> that represents the icon associated with this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"> </xref> som representerer ikonet knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the IconProperty dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer IconProperty avhengighetsegenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Begins the process of applying a template to create an <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter prosessen med å bruke en mal til å opprette en <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when editing annotation.
trans-unit.target: Starter behandlingen som oppstår når du redigerer merknad.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when the model item is changed..
trans-unit.target: Starter behandlingen som oppstår når modellelementet endres..

trans-unit.source: The new item.
trans-unit.target: Det nye elementet.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when any mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Starter behandlingen som oppstår når en museknappen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when an unhandled <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown> attached routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: Starter behandlingen som oppstår når en ubehandlet <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown>vedlagte rutet hendelsen når et element i ruten som er avledet av denne klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.
